NISER Alumni

Reconnect, Reunite, Reignite

The NISER Alumni Cell is a student and faculty-driven initiative dedicated to fostering a vibrant and connected global community of NISER alumni.


Our Mission:


  • Connect NISERites across the globe: We aim to bridge the gap between alumni, regardless of location or career path.

  • Alumni reunion: These events will provide opportunities for alumni to reconnect, share experiences, and forge new friendships.

  • Alumni-students interaction: We will invite alumni speakers to share their journeys, offering valuable insights and guidance to the next generation of NISERites.

  • Facilitate mentorship and guidance: Through the alumni network, current students can gain research and career advice, and connect with professionals in their fields of interest.


We are currently in the initial stages of building our network.






Together, we can build a dynamic and supportive NISER alumni community that empowers current and future generations.

We look forward to reconnecting with the alumni!
